tool_description: An API to fetch contents and orders data from the THETA Drop NFTs marketplace
name: THETA Drop Data Scraper
title: THETA Drop Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Search Results
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all search results from the THETA Drop marketplace search engine.

optional_parameters.name: content_creator
optional_parameters.description: Filters the search results with a creator id

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter by the type of content you want to search: token, pack or redeemable

api_list.name: Get Content
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back a content's summary and global transactions history based on its id.

api_list.name: Get Order
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back an order's summary and edition transactions history based on its id.

api_list.name: Get Top Sales
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the top sales from THETA Drop
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://theta-drop-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/sales/top"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "theta-drop-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Latest Sales
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back the latest sales data from THETA Drop
